original_text: until your brother's anger turns away from you, and he forgets what you have done to him. Then I will send and bring you from there. Why should I be bereft of you both in one day?”
korean_text: 네 형의 분노가 풀려 네가 자기에게 행한 것을 잊어버리거든 내가 곧 사람을 보내어 너를 거기서 불러오리라 어찌 하루에 너희 둘을 잃으랴

sentences.original_text: until your brother's anger turns away from you
sentences.korean_translation: 네 형의 분노가 너에게서 가실 때까지

sentences.original_text: and he forgets what you have done to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 네가 그에게 한 일을 잊을 때까지

sentences.original_text: Why should I be bereft of you both
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 어찌 너희 둘 다를 잃게 되겠느냐
